br.com.caelum.vraptor.view
Class DefaultLogicResult

java.lang.Object
  br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.DefaultLogicResult
All Implemented Interfaces:
View, LogicResult
public class DefaultLogicResult
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogicResult

The default implementation of LogicResult.
Uses cglib to provide proxies for client side redirect (url creation).

Author:
Guilherme Silveira

Method Detail

forwardTo

public <T> T forwardTo(java.lang.Class<T> type)
This implementation don't actually use request dispatcher for the forwarding. It runs forwarding logic, and renders its default view.

Specified by:
forwardTo in interface LogicResult

redirectTo

public <T> T redirectTo(java.lang.Class<T> type)
Description copied from interface: LogicResult

Returns an instance of that (pre-registered) logic.

Any method called in the returned instance will cause a client side redirect to the called action, with the given parameters as HTTP parameters.

Specified by:
redirectTo in interface LogicResult
